name: Adverse Effects
description:
Working two jobs and not getting much sleep, Judith decides to visit her doctor, who prescribes her some experimental sleeping pills. Shortly after taking her first pill, she starts to feel some Adverse Effects, which leave her yearning for you. Confused by her new feelings, she decides to stop taking the new drug, but the effects have already taken hold, and she can no longer fight her new urges. You play the recipient of these feelings; what will you do when her normal affections turn into something more?

Gameplay Includes:
  • 590+ Full HD Renders
  • 55+ Full HD Animations
  • 7,000+ Lines of Script
  • 30,000+ Words






Features Bush Selector!
What is a bush selector? For Judith, you'll be able to select what kind of pubic hair she has, be it shaved, trimmed or full bush.

Features:
  • Define Your Own Relationships
  • Steam Achievements
  • Full Music/Audio System
  • Story Altering Choices
  • Compelling Story
